Fault.name: E006CardPALSToPortal.bpel
Fault.msg: Assign activity does not have children. Empty assign is not necessary and is not supported in this version of OraBPEL PM

Fault.name: E006CardPALSToPortal.bpel
Fault.fix: Add the missing attribute or attributes.
